title: Boris Johnson says sorry after report slams lockdown parties
content:
1. Boris Johnson says sorry after report slams lockdown parties  Associated Press
  2. Live: Boris Johnson makes statement after Sue Gray's report is published  The Independent
  3. Sue Gray report received by UK PM Boris Johnson - BBC News  BBC News
  4. There are good reasons why the Met may want a redacted version of the Gray report  The Guardian
  5. The Metropolitan police’s integrity is now at risk in the ‘partygate’ affair  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
